tool_description: Manages role inheritance relationships allowing child roles to inherit permissions and properties from parent roles with override capabilities.

inheritance_type.description: Type of inheritance: full, partial, additive

override_permissions.description: Permissions that child roles can override

error_messages: Parent role not found: The specified parent_role_id does not exist.
Child role not found: One or more child_role_ids are invalid.
Invalid inheritance type: Use one of [full, partial, additive].
Circular inheritance detected: Child role cannot inherit from its own descendant.
Permission override conflict: Specified override permissions conflict with role constraints.
usage: Set up role inheritance by specifying parent_role_id and child_role_ids. Configure inheritance_type and override_permissions to control inheritance behavior.

inheritance_id.description: Unique identifier for the inheritance relationship

inherited_permissions.description: Number of permissions inherited by child roles
